commands.speaker: Kanan, Mari, Dia
commands.line: You want to put on...

commands.speaker: Ruby, Hanamaru, Yoshiko
commands.line: A solo live show?!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: D-Did something happen? Where is this coming from?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Riko and the others had the exact same reaction.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: We sure did...

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: I wanna give it a shot so I can grow even more as a school idol! Can I, can I?!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Performing solo means you'll be on stage all on your own, right? That's a pretty bold suggestion.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Oh jeez... Just the thought of performing alone gives me the heebie-jeebies.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: That is quite the grand proposal, little demon. Even I am a little surprised.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: It takes guts to take on any challenge! You have my full support! Let's do this, Chika-chi! You know what they say: Girls, be ambitious!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: You also have my support, zura! It sounds pretty tough, but if there's anything I can help out with, just let me know!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Sounds like you've got everyone's approval.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Thanks, everyone! I'll give it my best shot!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Well, you certainly aren't lacking in enthusiasm. Very well. Just make sure your performance is worthy of the Aqours name!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: I can't wait! So, where and when is it gonna be?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: ...I'll figure that out next!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Wh... I thought you had it all planned out already and that's why you suggested it?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Oh yeah, I remember hearing that there weren't really any events that you guys could participate in right now.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: That's right, zura. We're recharging right now, zura.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: There aren't any events that school idols can participate in around this time of year.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: There are a few that are pretty far away, but the application deadlines have most likely passed. Any that are still open are probably months away.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: *Whine* Then I can't perform a solo live show no matter how badly I want to!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Hmm... If there aren't any events, we'll just have to make our own! How's that sound?

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Yeah! That's the way! We'll just make our own!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: It would take months to put together an event from scratch, though.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: It doesn't have to be that complicated. All you need is a place to sing! You could even do it out on the streets in town!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Oh, I know! What about your place, Chika? How about you perform at your ryokan inn?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: At my place?! What, so I should just perform for all the guests coming to stay?

commands.select_args: ||It'll also help to promote your ryokan inn.|| select_1
||It'd be easier than booking an entire venue.|| select_2

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah! It'll guarantee a decent audience and I think it'll also help to promote your ryokan inn. What do you say?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Yeah! I think that's a great idea! I totally wanna perform a ryokan inn live show! I'll talk to my sisters about it as soon as I get back!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah, your family runs the place, so it'd be way easier than planning an event from scratch and booking a venue. We'd obviously need to get their permission, though.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: A ryokan inn live show! I love it! I know it'll help to promote the inn as well, so that'll be two birds with one stone! All right, I'll wrangle in their approval!
